content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

3->3->9->12->4->9

This is the shortest path from node 3 to node 9 in the provided graph. Please note that this answer assumes that the target node 9 is reachable from the starting node 3. If there are other nodes that also connect the starting node to the target node, they will also be included in the path.

3->3->7->10->4

This is the shortest path from node 3 to node 4 in the provided graph. Please note that this answer assumes that the target node 4 is reachable from the starting node 3. If there are other nodes that also connect the starting node to the target node, they will also be included in the path.
